channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiGate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiGate

item.title: CVE-2019-15705|2024-08-05T00:56:22.357Z -- fortinet -- fortigate
item.description: An Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the SSL VPN portal of FortiOS versions 6.2.1 and below, and 6.0.6 and below may allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to crash the SSL VPN service by sending a crafted POST request.
